[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@acoustic-content-sdk/api](./api.md) &gt; [LoggerFactory](./api.loggerfactory.md)

## LoggerFactory interface

Instantiator for loggers. Clients of the SDK can use this interface to inject their custom logger implementation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LoggerFactory 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [create(name)](./api.loggerfactory.create.md) | Construct the logger instance. There is no need to protect against the creation of multiple loggers, the caller will make sure that loggers are singletons. |
